## [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)

### Methods

|                                                                      Method                                                                      |                                           Return type                                           |                                                           Brief description                                                            |
|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| [createDraftReply(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#createDraftReply(String))                       | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)             | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of this message using the reply-to address.                                             |
| [createDraftReply(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#createDraftReply(String,Object))       | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)             | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of this message using the reply-to address, with optional arguments.                    |
| [createDraftReplyAll(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#createDraftReplyAll(String))                 | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)             | Creates a draft message replying to the sender using the reply-to address and all recipients of this message.                          |
| [createDraftReplyAll(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#createDraftReplyAll(String,Object)) | [GmailDraft](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-draft)             | Creates a draft message replying to the sender of this message using the reply-to address and all recipients, with optional arguments. |
| [forward(recipient)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#forward(String))                                    | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Forwards this message to new recipients.                                                                                               |
| [forward(recipient, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#forward(String,Object))                    | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Forwards this message to new recipients, with optional arguments.                                                                      |
| [getAttachments()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getAttachments())                                     | [GmailAttachment[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-attachment) | Gets all the attachments for this message.                                                                                             |
| [getAttachments(options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getAttachments(Object))                        | [GmailAttachment[]](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-attachment) | Gets all the attachments for this message.                                                                                             |
| [getBcc()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getBcc())                                                     | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the comma-separated recipients bcc'd on this message.                                                                             |
| [getBody()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getBody())                                                   | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the HTML content of the body of this message.                                                                                     |
| [getCc()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getCc())                                                       | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the comma-separated recipients cc'd on this message.                                                                              |
| [getDate()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getDate())                                                   | `Date`                                                                                          | Gets the date and time of this message.                                                                                                |
| [getFrom()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getFrom())                                                   | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the sender of this message.                                                                                                       |
| [getHeader(name)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getHeader(String))                                     | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the value of an RFC 2822 header given the header name.                                                                            |
| [getId()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getId())                                                       | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the ID of this message.                                                                                                           |
| [getPlainBody()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getPlainBody())                                         | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the content of the body of this message without HTML formatting.                                                                  |
| [getRawContent()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getRawContent())                                       | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the raw content of this message.                                                                                                  |
| [getReplyTo()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getReplyTo())                                             | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the reply-to address of this message (usually the sender).                                                                        |
| [getSubject()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getSubject())                                             | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the subject of this message.                                                                                                      |
| [getThread()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getThread())                                               | [GmailThread](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-thread)           | Gets the thread that contains this message.                                                                                            |
| [getTo()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#getTo())                                                       | `String`                                                                                        | Gets the comma-separated recipients of this message.                                                                                   |
| [isDraft()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isDraft())                                                   | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is a draft.                                                                                                  |
| [isInChats()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isInChats())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is a chat.                                                                                                   |
| [isInInbox()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isInInbox())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is in the inbox.                                                                                             |
| [isInPriorityInbox()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isInPriorityInbox())                               | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Returns `true` if this message is in the priority inbox; returns `false` otherwise.                                                    |
| [isInTrash()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isInTrash())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is in the trash.                                                                                             |
| [isStarred()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isStarred())                                               | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is starred.                                                                                                  |
| [isUnread()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#isUnread())                                                 | `Boolean`                                                                                       | Gets whether this message is unread.                                                                                                   |
| [markRead()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#markRead())                                                 | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Marks the message as read.                                                                                                             |
| [markUnread()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#markUnread())                                             | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Marks the message as unread.                                                                                                           |
| [moveToTrash()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#moveToTrash())                                           | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Moves the message to the trash.                                                                                                        |
| [refresh()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#refresh())                                                   | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Reloads this message and associated state from Gmail (useful in case the labels, read state, etc., have changed).                      |
| [reply(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#reply(String))                                             | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address.                                                                      |
| [reply(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#reply(String,Object))                             | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address, with optional arguments.                                             |
| [replyAll(body)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#replyAll(String))                                       | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Replies to the sender using the reply-to address and all recipients of this message.                                                   |
| [replyAll(body, options)](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#replyAll(String,Object))                       | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Replies to the sender of this message using the reply-to address and all recipients, with optional arguments.                          |
| [star()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#star())                                                         | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Stars the message.                                                                                                                     |
| [unstar()](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message#unstar())                                                     | [GmailMessage](https://developers.google.com/apps-script/reference/gmail/gmail-message)         | Unstars the message.                                                                                                                   |
